name: Pavolia Reine (Hololive ID)
description:
LoRA model for Pavolia Reine from Hololive Indonesia.

All pictures, comments and reviews are appreciated as I can't test all the usage scenarios.

Weight around 0.8-1 but feel free to play around.

For v2b :

Main triggers:

  • pavolia reine (all training pictures contains it so it's a main trigger that you can work with)

  • reine-long-hair

  • reine-short-hair

  • reine-main-outfit

  • reine-second-outfit

Full triggers that focuses on specific part :

  • reine-long-hair, very long hair, side ponytail, braided bangs, feather hair ornament, white pupils, single earring,

  • reine-short-hair, short hair, braided bangs, feather hair ornament, white pupils, earrings

  • reine-main-outfit, blue dress, dress, detached sleeves, navel cutout, white thighhighs

  • reine-second-outfit, black collared shirt, crop top, white pants, midriff, bare shoulders

Most of the time no need to use full prompts, often using "pavolia reine, long hair" or "reine-short-hair, short hair" i enough, just experiment around.

(You might want to use long dress instead of blue dress at times)

Additional triggers :

  • shawl

  • blue eyes, green eyes or teal eyes (depends if you need it)

  • grey hair (for low CFG or stubborn LoRA/checkpoints)

Issues I have encountered and some workarounds :

  • Mixing short hair with her main outfit is unstable and stubborn.

    Outfit have problems with correctly generating at times or second outfit bleeds over.

    Increasing CFG to 9 or a bit higher helps with that. Adding crop top and black sleeveless shirt to negatives helps with bleeding.

    Using only "pavolia reine, short hair and main outfit triggers" also helps with main outfit generation.

  • Main outfit bleeds to outfits that have focus on breasts area when using long hair triggers, especially problematic with dress related outfits and armours

    Reducing CFG to 5 and increasing weight of specific outfit helps a bit (might need to be up to 1.5 or so...)

    Also adding dress, blue dress to negatives helps a lot.

    (At times it can create creative outfits as armour stylized after her dress)

    (Weirdly enough not many issues with bikini and similar???)

    That problem is less common or not existent when using short hair.

  • Other LoRA do work well depending on their quality.

NSFW capable without problems.

Hope you will enjoy it!

modelVersions.name: v2b
trainedWords: very long hair, side ponytail, braided bangs, feather hair ornament, white pupils, single earring
short hair, braided bangs, feather hair ornament, white pupils, earrings
blue dress, dress, detached sleeves, navel cutout, white thighhighs
collared shirt, crop top, white pants, midriff, bare shoulders
modelVersions.description:
It's an difficult LoRA to train as her outfits and hair styles are complete opposites, complicated/detailed and simple/plain.

For example: Second outfit was already overbaking at 5 steps per sample where main outfit was still undercooked at 8 steps...

Probably there are ways to make it better that I don't know about yet.

But at the moment it works but can be a little grumpy and unstable.

Changes :

  • Added pavolia reine trigger to all sampling pictures

  • Reduced main outfit bleeding but will still happen depending what you want to call for.

  • Changed base model from NAI to Anything 3.0

  • Increased sample size from 512-512 to 576-576

Weight around 0.8-1 but feel free to play around.

Main triggers:

  • pavolia reine (all training pictures contains it so it's a main trigger that you can work with)

  • reine-long-hair

  • reine-short-hair

  • reine-main-outfit

  • reine-second-outfit

Full triggers that focuses on specific part :

  • reine-long-hair, very long hair, side ponytail, braided bangs, feather hair ornament, white pupils, single earring,

  • reine-short-hair, short hair, braided bangs, feather hair ornament, white pupils, earrings

  • reine-main-outfit, blue dress, dress, detached sleeves, navel cutout, white thighhighs

  • reine-second-outfit, black collared shirt, crop top, white pants, midriff, bare shoulders

(You might want to use long dress instead of blue dress at times)

Additional triggers :

  • shawl

  • blue eyes, green eyes or teal eyes (depends if you need it)

  • grey hair (for low CFG or stubborn LoRA/checkpoints)

modelVersions.name: v2
trainedWords: reine-main-outfit, blue dress, detached sleeves, navel cutout, bare shoulders, white thighhighs
reine-long-hair, very long hair, side ponytail, braided bangs, feather hair ornament, white pupils, single earring,
reine-second-outfit, black sleeveless shirt, crop top, white pants, midriff, bare shoulders
reine-short-hair, short hair, braided bangs, feather hair ornament, white pupils, earrings
modelVersions.description:
Main outfit is overbaked and bleeds over. Keeping this one but recommending using v2b.

Recommended weight is 0.8-1.

  • Long hair : reine-long-hair, very long hair, side ponytail, braided bangs, feather hair ornament, white pupils, single earring,

  • Main outfit : reine-main-outfit, blue dress, detached sleeves, navel cutout, bare shoulders, white thighhighs

  • Short hair: reine-short-hair, short hair, braided bangs, feather hair ornament, white pupils, earrings

  • Second Outfit : black sleeveless shirt, crop top, white pants, midriff, bare shoulders

  • You can add aqua eyes, blue eyes, green eyes or teal eyes whatever you prefer.

  • Bonus: Use shawl and bespectacled on second outfit/short hairstyle to call for her orange shawl or glasses respectively.

  • Recommending using mature tag to make her look more feminine and well... mature as her model.
